permissions: Admin users can update change requests; non-admin users can update change requests for organizations whose broker is in their membership scope (or when the organization has no broker).
side_effects: Updates the change request record (currently requests only).
validation_notes: Argument <id> is required. At least one updatable attribute must be provided; otherwise the request is rejected. When --requests is provided, it must be a JSON array of objects; use [] to clear. Server validates requests is an array of hashes.

flags.name: --requests
flags.description: Request items as JSON array (use [] to clear)
flags.validation: Must be a JSON array of objects; empty string is invalid (use []).
